title: Data Ownership
description: Enables data ecosystems to maintain full control over their data within a secure, decentralized infrastructure.

title: Decentralized AI
description: Transforms infrastructure using a lightweight protocol into a secure, scalable, trustless peer-to-peer federated learning (FL) network for model updates.

title: Direct Rewards
description: Supports peer-to-peer data monetization within ecosystems, removing intermediaries and allowing direct rewards.
